title: How do I beat Gnar/Shyv?
body: I'm new to tft and it seems every single match back to back to back there are multiple people using them no matter what. I have been using assassins and it is not seeming to do very much vs it since everyone and their mother is using gnar and shyv.

replies.body: i jsut got demoted due to this a total of 4 players all had shyvanna and gnar at level 2  just nothing i could do worst is when they have warmog{{item:3083}}  {{item:3124}}  these 2 items on them with there health buffs makes it impossable to kill them il try demons next round see how that does

Gnar is positioned back line so assassins can take him down.
Once transformed he can be stunned by glaciars buff or sword breaker.

Either manabreak or stun via hush/demons/glacial/kassa to prevent them from transforming, or some solid damage paired with either redbuff or morellos to deny the warmong regen and ideally a braum or something to keep them busy.

Anyway, gnar is rather broken and hard to deal with if he ever gets the chance to transform cause his abillity can totally fuck up any positioning while porvideing a solid stun, good damage and a massive body to go with it...
{{champion:67}}, {{champion:80}} , {{item:3165}} , or Red Buff all do max HP percentage damage, which can really help against them.
